title: Shopify Expert
job_overview:
Hi! We are looking for an experienced Shopify Expert to join our team while working remotely.

*PLEASE READ CAREFULLY OR YOUR APPLICATION MIGHT NOT BE CONSIDERED*

In need of an experienced Shopify Expert.

For this role, a strong Internet connection is required, along with a keen eye for details and good spoken and written English. An understanding of management softwares like Airtable and design apps such as Figma and adobe XD is preferred but not required.

Please provide examples of sites you've built & your experience level with each of the above platforms. Ideal candidate will be open to and will learn new platforms. Happy to pay a little more if you have a really good/solid experience.

About the company:
Buzzcube is an online agency that provides unlimited Web Design and Web Development services to our clients who pay a monthly membership. Our core values are great quality and unmatched turn around times. This means that we always provide great products and services to our clients, and we do it fast.

To do this we need a team of selected talents:
- Web Designers
- Web Developers
- Website Testers

Requirements and skills:
- Proven experience as a Shopify or relevant role
- Great attention to details
- Familiarity with web design
- Use the word 'Shopify' as code word when filling up the application form
- Good spoken and written English
- Comfortable creating Loom videos
- Excellent time management skills
- Available during European Daytime (preferred but not required)

Starting wage will be $4/hour (USD) with the view of this increasing as our relationship develops and we get to know each other.

Once again include any links to pages that you have worked on, let us know your experience with coding, let us know what experience you have and which platforms you are familiar with, and apply using the the link below - IF ANY OF THESE INFO ARE MISSING, YOUR APPLICATION WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.

If you think you are a good fit for this position please fill up this form: Upgrade to see actual info/shrd4JR2dfxdUWXID

We will then review your information and get in touch with you to organize a Zoom Call.

Please also be aware that in order to get selected for this position you'll have to go through a trial period that may or may not be paid (details provided via zoom discovery call).

Thank you,
Matt - CEO and Founder of BuzzCube
Giada - Hiring Manager at BuzzCube
